name: Dragon Crystal X
description:
This game was made in a short amount of time for Driftwood Gaming's 5-Minute Game Jam. The purpose of the game jam is to showcase some awesome action sequences and then share that coding with others. This game is approximately 5 minutes long depending on how fast you read. There's a timer at the top so you can keep better track. Action Sequences are located with game folder in .txt documents so you can copy and paste into your own games or modify as you see fit.

Dragon Crystal X

Join Spellblade Tea as she battles the Evil Dark Lord Drifty. Drifty is close to capturing all the Dragon Crystal's and has unleashed his most powerful spell, the Arcane Beam against Tea. Will she survive? Find out on the exciting next episode of Dragon Crystal X!
